missing_pokemon: Hah! Where's your squad? Even Digletts dig deeper than you!
No Pokémon? Team Magma’s volcanoes don’t burn for weaklings!
low_level_cap: Your Pokémon couldn’t melt a snow cone! Train in Magma’s heat!
Pathetic. Come back when your team’s as fiery as our ambition!
over_level_cap: Rebellious Pokémon? We’ll bury them under molten rock!
Control your beasts—or Team Magma’s lava will!
battle_start: Feel the heat of Magma’s vision! Burn to ash!
You’re just kindling for our glorious future!
battle_lost: Ngh…! The land will still rise!
This is a setback… Leader Maxie will crush you!
battle_won: Team Magma’s fire can’t be quenched!
on_cooldown: Buzz off. My Pokémon are busy reshaping continents.
Come back when you’re worth the magma.
is_busy: Can’t you see I’m terraforming?! Scram!
Interrupting sacred work? You’re volcanic dust!
done_looser: Enjoy your petty win. The land will still rise!
Leader Maxie’s plans can’t be stopped by ants!
done_winner: Another failure for the magma pits. Good riddance.
Your ashes will fertilize our new world.
done_generic: Enough. My Pokémon need lava baths.
Boring. Go play in a sandbox.
